author: andreas
content: Paul, I'm afraid I don't really understand this. I see why you call fear a motivator for spending money, but don't you feel that this is a strange and perverted state to be in? I mean, you seem to embrace it in a way, and I really can't see how a system based on fear could ever be positive. I would always feel a need to change that. Maybe can't be changed, maybe it's just human nature, but then I would call it one of humanities tragic faults. Did I get you wrong?
